title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Coaching Strategy Development to Improve Feedback Effectiveness for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational teaching competencies and educational practicum experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can clearly explain feedback criteria for core teaching methods (student-thinking-provoking questioning techniques)
Over 70% of participants can design specific feedback provision plans through practical video analysis

Learners will provide structured coaching feedback (based on the SBI model: Situation-Behavior-Impact) to peer teachers three or more times during project-based evaluations over six months and develop action plans achieving 'Excellent' grades in four of five rubric items.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
